shridharan demala janathawa wetha sidu kala jathi ghathanayata nisi lesa jathyanthara adhikshanaya yatathe wimarshanayak itu kala yuthu bawa pawasa thibe.me pasubima mada agramathya ranil wikramasinha mahatha hindu puwathpathata prakashayak karamin shri lankawa sambandha yuda aparadha parikshanayak kirimata jathyantharayata ayithiyak nathayi sandahan kara atha.me athara shri lankawata erehi jiniwa parikshana warthawa manawa himikam kawunsilaya hamuwe eli dakwimata paya 48 kata pera jiniwa nithya niyojitha margayen janadhipathi maithripala sirisena mahatha wetha labenu athayi manawa himikam kawunsilaye aaranchi marga dakwayi.me thaththwaya mada athi wi thibena kanagatudayaka thaththwaya nam jiniwa - surich, prayibarg athulu nagarawala shri lankikayan sitiyath kisiwek eki warthawa gana wirodhathawak dakwimata idiripath nowimayi.me athara meratata pamini amarikanu niladharin wu nisha biswal saha tom malinowski rajaye baladharin samaga sakachcha kale yuda aparadha chodana pilibanda deshiya yanthranaya ketumpath kirima gana yayi anawaranaya wiya.meki yuda aparadha chodana parikshana warthawa jiniwa manawa himikam sasiwarayedi eli dakwimata pera drawida sandhana manthri shridharange sohoyura meheya wana yuropa koti guwan widuliya pamine shri lankawa sambandhayen itha barapathala wiwechanathmaka warthawak idiripath wana bawayi.mewan thorathuru heliwana awasthawe nisha biswal saha tom malinowski uthuru maha amathi wi.

«kisidu dasakin nodutu kisidu sawanakata nowakunu kisidu minis sithakin warnana kala nohaki aaswadayan, aswasili saha daspinawana bhagyayan mage gaththan wenuwen swargaye mama sudanam kara aththemi» {owun karamin siti data pa්rathipala washayen thamanta sangawanu labu (thamange) as pinawana da gana kisiwek nodanithi.’’ (32-17) yanuwen dewadutha muhammadano deshana kaloya}[mulasha්raya : buhari] melowehi sathuta danawana ka්riyawa wanuye dewindananta aadaraya kirima saha unwahanseta namaskara kirimaya.
